TopicTitle: Can we have KAL Controllers be able to control the rotation of the new docking ports for 1.12?

Articles.Content:
Ok so we know this much. new Docking ports will have rotation but doesn't use the same 'technology' as Breaking Ground.

Stacking docking ports could allow for much more than 15 degrees of rotation.

Can we have a KAL controller be able to move the rotation via a toggle and via a graph?
